name: Creeping Chlorophyl
description:
Welcome to Creeping Chlorophyl

In Creeping Chlorophyl your spaceship is slowly possessed by an insatiable plant. Try to destroy that plant. Be careful that the mysterious plant doesn't eat important spaceship components, or you might crash.

Have fun

Controls:

WASD to move.
Press Space to pick up / drop explosive canisters.
Hold Space while holding a canister to throw it and make it explode on vines.
E to toggle doors.
